data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardDataSourceNameExistsMessage
data.value: A data source with the specified name already exists

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardCannotConnectMessage
data.value: Cannot connect to the database. See the details below.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardCannotRetrieveDatabasesMessage
data.value: Cannot retrieve the list of available databases. See the details below.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardDataSourceCreatedMessage
data.value: The data source has been successfully created

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardFinishPageText
data.value: Select an object to include in your data source

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardCannotCreateDataSourceMessage
data.value: Cannot create an empty data source. Please select an object to include.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.QueryDesignControlRemoveTables
DataAccessUIStringId.QueryDesignControlExpressionChanged
data.value: This action will reset the SQL expression, and all your changes will be discarded. Do you want to continue?

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.QueryDesignControlNoSelection
data.value: No column has been selected. Please select at least one column to proceed.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.QueryDesignControlAliasAlreadyExists
data.value: The specified alias already exists. Do you want to correct the value?

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.QueryDesignControlTableNameAlreadyExists
data.value: A table with the specified name already exists. Please specify a different table name.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.QueryDesignControlTableNameEmpty
data.value: The table name cannot be empty.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.JoinEditorGreaterOrEqualOperator
data.value: Is greater than or equal to

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.JoinEditorLessOrEqualOperator
data.value: Is less than or equal to

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.JoinEditorFillAllFieldsException
data.value: Some fields are empty. Please fill all empty fields or remove the corresponding conditions to proceed.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ErrorFormDatasourceInitializationText
data.value: Unable to load data into one or several datasources. See information below for details.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.LoadingDatasourceOutOfMemoryError
data.value: Not enough memory to load data

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.LoadingDataException
data.value: Data loading failed because the exception occurred.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardDataSourceEmptyNameMessage
data.value: The data source name cannot be empty.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.RebuildResultSchemaConfirmationText
data.value: Do you want to execute the following queries on the server and obtain the resulting schema?

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.MessageLessThanTwoQueries
data.value: At least two queries are required to create a master-detail relation.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.QueryEditorMessageInvalidQuery
data.value:
Query validation failed with message: {0}
To discard this query and begin from scratch, click OK. To close the visual editor and keep the current query, click Cancel.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardEmptyStoredProceduresListMessage
data.value: There are no any stored procedures in current database.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageChooseConnection
data.value: Do you want to use an existing data connection?

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageChooseEFConnectionString
data.value: Do you want to select a connection string from the list of available settings?

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageChooseEFContext
data.value: Choose an existing data context or browse for an assembly.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageConfigureQuery
data.value: Create a query or select a stored procedure.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageConfigureParameters
data.value: Configure query parameters and preview the result.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageConfigureStoredProcedures
data.value: Add stored procedures to the data source, configure their parameters and preview the result.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardConfirmExecutionMessage
data.value: Do you want to execute the query on the server and obtain the resulting query schema?

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageConnectionProperties
data.value: Select the data provider and specify the connection properties.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.MasterDetailEditorAddRelationMessage
data.value: Add a relation to the detail query

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.MasterDetailEditorInvalidQueryNameMessage
data.value: Cannot find the specified query: "{0}". Specify an existing query name.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.MasterDetailEditorInvalidColumnNameMessage
data.value: Cannot find the specified column: "{0}". Specify an existing column name.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.MasterDetailEditorInvalidColumnQueryNameMessage
data.value: Cannot find the specified query: "{0}". Specify an existing query name before selecting a column.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.MasterDetailEditorInvalidRelationNameMessage
data.value: A relation with the specified name already exists.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ODSEditorsNoDataSetMessage
data.value: The current operation cannot be accomplished unless the data source has been specified.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ODSEditorsNoDataMemberMessage
data.value: Cannot specify parameters unless the DataMember property has been assigned a value.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ODSEditorsIsPropertyMessage
data.value: The {0} data member is a property. To be able to receive parameters, a data member must be a method.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ODSEditorsNoParametersMessage
data.value: The {0} data member cannot receive parameters, because this is a method without parameters.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ODSEditorsAbstractTypeMessage
data.value: Cannot use a constructor to create an object of the {0} type that is a static or abstract class, or interface.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ODSEditorsStaticMemberMessage
data.value: {0} is a static member. Using a constructor to create an instance of the {1} class is not appropriate.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ODSEditorsCannotResolveDataSource
data.value: Cannot resolve the specified object type. To specify the object’s assembly, return type, data member and/or constructor parameters, use the Data Source editor.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ODSEditorsCannotResolveDataMember
data.value: Cannot resolve the specified data member. To specify the data member and its parameters, use the Data Member editor.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.ODSEditorsNoMembersInType
data.value: The {0} data source type does not provide any members suitable for binding.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageChooseObjectAssembly
data.value: Select an assembly containing the class type definition of a data source.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageChooseObjectMember
data.value: Select a data source member (if required).

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.EFEditorsNoStoredProcs
data.value: No stored procedures are available in the data context.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.QueryBuilderNoTablesAndViews
data.value: A database does not contain tables or views and does not support SQL editing. To be able to run the Query Builder, make sure that your database contains at least one table or supports SQL editing.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageChooseObjectBindingMode_RetrieveSchemaDescription
data.value:
Only the data source schema is retrieved from the specified object, without feeding the actual data.
To manually retrieve the actual data, create a data source object’s instance in code and assign it to the ObjectDataSource.DataSource property.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.WizardPageChooseObjectBindingMode_RetrieveDataDescription
data.value: The object data source automatically creates an instance of the specified type by using one of the available constructors. If only one constructor is available, this constructor will be used.

data.name: DataAccessUIStringId.QueryBuilderCustomSqlRequiresParameters
data.value: The query contains parameters and cannot be executed before they are declared. Please go to the next wizard page to declare the required query parameters and preview the results.
